entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
